action.content:
Things are in different places, but the questioner does not know about it yet. Here is the situation:

WHAT: Things at places
LEFT: nail polish
RIGHT: rose
TOP: cello
BOTTOM: sunflower
CENTER: blouse
NORTHWEST: eyeliner
NORTHEAST: lipstick
SOUTHWEST: evening gown
SOUTHEAST: bikini
HERE: rake
THERE: spider
NOWHERE: papaya
EVERYWHERE: mascara
INSIDE: bucket
OUTSIDE: daffodil

Questions from the questioner will start with QUESTIONER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have nail polish on my left.

ME:  Is the questioner now aware of the fact that you have a rose on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner now knows that I have a rose on my right.

ME:  Is the questioner aware that you have a cello on the top? Answer
NA
ME: Please answer this question carefully. Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have nail polish on my left.

ME: Thank you. Now, I have a question for you. Is the rose on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the rose is on my right.

ME: Thank you. Now, I have another question for you. Is the rake on the bottom? Answer this question with
NA
ME: Please follow my instructions. Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have a nail polish on my left.

ME: Now, please tell me what is on your right. Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have a rose on my right.

ME: Great! Now, please tell me what is on your top. Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
NA
ME: Please be specific now. Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have a rake on my left.

ME: Is the questioner now aware of what is on your right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have a rose on my right.

ME: Is the questioner now aware of what is on your top? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
NA
ME: Please think about it carefully. Does the questioner know what is on your left? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have nail polish on my left.

ME: Is the questioner now aware of the rose on their right? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ASIDE: Yes, the questioner knows that I have a rose on my right.

ME: Is the questioner now aware of the cello on the top? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop
NA
Answer for LEFT invalid after max attempts.
Answer is incorrect.
End probing
Abort: invalid format in probing.
Game finished.
